translated: Verses of the Elder Nuns .🔽The Group of Fives
having heard the Dhamma from a monk,

analyzed: nibbānam padamat cuta  sā aham puttam dhītaram ca
translated: the deathless state, the supreme security from bondage.🔽I abandoned my son and daughter,🔽my wealth and grain,
and went forth from the home life.
While I was a trainee nun,
and the underlying tendencies that are their roots.
Having gone forth as a nun,🔽I remembered my past lives,
and my divine eye was purified,
